name: Anti-Adblock Killer | Reek
body:
/!\ IMPORTANT /!\

  • THIS IS NOT A UNIVERSAL SOLUTION FOR ALL ANTI ADBLOCK SCRIPTS
  • BEFORE REPORTING ANYTHING PLEASE READ THIS
  • USE DISCUSSIONS FOR REPORT NOT REVIEWS

Support Author

  • Donate it
  • Rate it. (Reviews)
  • Become it Fan. (Fans)
  • Share it (Social Network)

Donate

  • Benefits: Your queries will be given priority, and you will figure in the source code as well as a generous donor.
  • 1Lbr1wxgpX2YqVbdW4tfaqcvoeDRVWvc8n
  • Make a donation is an act of generosity, and because your support, however modest it is necessary. Because you love or enjoy Anti-Adblock Killer. Your donations help to continue to support and improve this project!

Instructions

Step 1 - Install Add-On
  • Install Greasemonkey
  • Install Tampermonkey
  • Install NinjaKit
  • Install Violentmonkey
Step 2 - Restart Browser
  • After installation (which requires restarting your browser), you are now ready to install userscripts.
Step 3 - Subscribe
  • Anti-Adblock Killer | Filters for Adblockers - Subscribe
Step 4 - Install
  • Anti-Adblock Killer | Userscript - Install
Step 5 - Ready
  • Test
  • Say Thanks
  • Report new site, fix site or bug
  • Do not forget to donate, review, add to favorites and share it, thanks.

Changelog

  • See changes

Features

  • Disable Anti-Adblock Protections
  • Check & Notify updates
  • Suggest Features

Why it does not work

  1. Check if userscript manager is activated. (Greasemonkey, Tampermonkey, NinjaKit, Violentmonkey)
  2. Check if Anti AdBlock Killer is activated.
  3. Check if you have installed the lastest version of Anti AdBlock Killer | Userscript
  4. Check if you have subscribe to Anti AdBlock Killer | Filters for Adblockers - Subscribe
  5. Check if you have another anti adblock user script installed (Ex: Anti-AntiBlock Plus, Anti-Adblocker), please disable or remove it, because it can generate the conflict.
  6. Check if the site is in "Supported Sites".
    • If the site is not in it, please report it here.
    • If it exists, but the script does not work, it probably means that the anti adblock protection has changed in it please report it here
  7. Disable Add-On: Disable Anti-Adblock 3.1, Ghostery, Online Security Avast, Donotrackme, Kaspersky Anti-Banner, Freebox (Anti-pub)
  8. Consult Discussions

Supported Browsers

  • Works fine ! (Recommended)
  • Partially works !
  • Partially works !
  • Partially works !
  • No works !
  • Recommended: Firefox + Greasemonkey + Adblock Plus.
